TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void CreateUserErrorEventHandler(object sender, CreateUserErrorEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed CreateUserErrorEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub CreateUserErrorEventHandler(sender As Object, e As CreateUserErrorEventArgs)
public delegate void CreateUserErrorEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, CreateUserErrorEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Un objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controla un evento del control .

span.span: Represents the method that handles a event in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks El clase representa el método que controla el evento en un control.The class represents the method that handles the event in a control. Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [NIB: delegados y eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
